name: PieuwPieuw3D
description:
Hello, and welcome to PieuwPieuw3d! This is a  fun multiplayer first-person shooter! You can play this game with anyone with up to 6 players in each room. There are 4 weapons and 3 different maps.

This game is still in development, so if you encountered any bugs or have any suggestions, feel free to leave a comment or send a mail to pindarotsje425@gmail.com. If you'd like to help me with making this game, if you for example can make great music/sound effects or good models which I can use please let me know as well!

The game in WebGL format is not perfect, but I'll work on it and improve later on. (fullscreen for best performance) 

What I want to add:

  • Settings
  • Join/leave notifications
  • Music/sound effects
